title: Video: Billie Marten – Lionhearted
body:
**Billie Marten’s** debut album, **_Writing of Blues and Yellows_**, is shaping up rather beautifully, with latest single _Lionhearted_ being the fifth track lifted from it.

Whilst her early demos showed tremendous promise, these new tracks feel far more mature and part of a fully realised sound – yet maintain the emotional fragility that’s now become such a distinctive part of her aesthetic. Check out Lionhearted below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
